title: All 212 T206 SOLD! Thank you all for the kind words.
author: Archive

posts.post_title: All 212 T206 SOLD! Thank you all for the kind words.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ray Piskadlo
Thanks to everyone who bought T206 cards from me the past couple of weeks. Thanks also go out to those who sent me emails about how wonderful life is being a dad. My wife and I found out last Thursday that we are going to have a boy! Now we just have to agree on a name... although the name Denton has definitely grown on her over the weekend.

Thank you again. It's the people on this board that make this so much more than a hobby. [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

all the best,

posts.post_title: All 212 T206 SOLD! Thank you all for the kind words.

Thanks,
Ray

posts.post_title: All 212 T206 SOLD! Thank you all for the kind words.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ray Piskadlo
No Tip Tops here... maybe another Ray?

I have two people who are interested in the group, and am in the process of scanning all the cards. I will probably not know about individual prices until tomorrow. But promise to answer each email. 

Thank you for the congrats everyone. Even people who have no interest have been very excited for me. My wife was very happy to hear some of the messages received today.

I will keep all posted.

Regards,
Ray

posts.post_title: All 212 T206 SOLD! Thank you all for the kind words.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ray Piskadlo
A quick update... I have about 10 people who have requested scans of numerous cards over the past two days. I have held cards for those people, giving them a chance to review the scans and make decisions. Unfortunately, I cannot wait for those people any longer. I have received 17 new emails today for scans as well.

Starting immediately, each card will be sold to the first person who emails me saying they want it. I apologize to those who may miss out on a card because of this. I have tried to keep everyone in a specific order. But, in the end, I need to make sales and I have people waiting for scans/prices.

Thank you again for all the congrats up to this point! Maybe I'll post a picture of our ultrasound tomorrow! haha. 

All the best,
Ray

ps... Shaughnessey is SOLD.
Carrigan is SOLD.
Bastian, Greminger, Helm, Kiernan, King, Molesworth, Stark, and Thornton now SOLD
Doyle NY, Doyle LENOX, Matty Dark and White caps SOLD!
Steinfeldt EPDG SOLD.
Kling SOLD.

I am removing names off the list above as cards sell to make it easier for potential buyers. Keep the emails coming. Still waiting on about 12 responses!
